item.title: (Class Suggestion)-Death Reaper-Neutral Special
item.dc:creator: DeathReaperRH
item.description:
Death Reaper-Neutral Special(This class is basically the king of reapers)
Passive 1-Vile tongue-You can talk to the dead at night(You appear as the psychic talking to one of the reapers)
Passive 2-King of Death-Immune to Death and occupy
Day ability 1-Soul Tap-Trap someone’s soul making them a reaper(Doesn’t work on prince and any unseen/cult)
Day ability 2-Unearthly Scream-All your reapers will get one kill guaranteed-1 or 2 uses
Night ability 1-Hollow-Convert someone into a reaper(Doesn’t work on prince or any evils.)
Night ability 2-Reap-Reap someone bypasses healing
This class spawns with 1 reaper and basically makes a reaper faction or army.
Probably overpowered as shit but I couldn’t help making myself the king of reapers.
This class would take over the NK spot.
The oldest reaper would become Death Reaper.
